title: Bloomberg Markets: Rani Therapeutics CEO on `Robo-Pill'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Rani Therapeutics CEO on `Robo-Pill'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Mir Imran\u0010Chairman/CEO/Founder\u0010Rani Therapeutics\u0010Discussing development of a "robo-pill" that injects from inside the body - in the intestines for people who have a fear of needles.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
